top_strengths: 267 tests across 20 files with comprehensive coverage of all major modules
Full audit-fix-re-audit pipeline proven across 15 iterations with 68 -> 90 score arc
Zero-install Try It Now evaluation with 6 tool-enabled agents, debate, and cross-iteration learning
top_weaknesses: No examples/demo-repo with before/after audit JSONs for documentation proof
Score progression on landing page uses static data instead of real state.json history
Some text-gray-400 instances on bg-gray-800 backgrounds fail WCAG AA contrast (3.9:1)

action_items.action: Create examples/demo-repo/ with before/after audit JSONs showing improvement cycle
Dynamically load score_history from state.json on landing page
action_items.impact: Shows real improvement arc instead of stale snapshots

action_items.action: Fix WCAG contrast for text-gray-400 on bg-gray-800 backgrounds
